title: 磨皮美颜锐化光照去闪烁视频AE/PR插件 Digital Anarchy 2021.9 Win 含Beauty Box/Flicker Free/Samurai等
author: 大众脸
content: Digital Anarchy 2021.9 版本插件合集，专为 Windows 系统设计，兼容 After Effects CC 2015–2021 和 Premiere Pro CC 2015–2021。包含多个常用视频处理插件，由 Team V.R 提供，支持一键安装使用。适用于人像美化、去闪烁、光照模拟和智能锐化等专业视频后期需求。
supported_versions: After Effects CC 2015 – 2021, Premiere Pro CC 2015 – 2021

plugins_included.name: Beauty Box v5.0.1
plugins_included.description: 人像磨皮润肤美颜视频插件

plugins_included.name: Light Wrap v1.2.1
plugins_included.description: 扣像边缘模拟真实光照插件

plugins_included.name: Power Search v2.1
plugins_included.description: 元数据搜索工具（仅支持PR）

plugins_included.name: Samurai v1.2.1
plugins_included.description: 视频智能锐化清晰插件
